mapper.insert: insert into member_board(board_num, board_id, board_title, board_content, board_file) values (COM_SEQ.nextval, #{board_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_file})
mapper.select: select * from member_board order by board_num
mapper.update: update member_board set board_count=#{board_count+1} where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select * from member_board left outer join user_comment on (member_board.board_num = user_comment.board_num) where member_board.board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.update: update member_board set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_file=#{board_file} where board_num=#{board_num}
